HALF LIFE ORANGE VERSION 
Game of the Year Edition. by Sierra and Valve
This is a classic shoot em up game with crazy old school graphics and puzzles.
Some of the older classic games still have it and this is one of them, OK graphics aren't top notch, but the fun factor and puzzles are still there giving us hell and the Half Life Series have them in abundance.  Don't be fooled into thinking just because its old its not up to much. This game is far from easy and on any level I can guarantee you wont complete it in one sitting. I think some of today's game makers need to look at some of the classics because they have lost the art of whats fun and whats boring.  A lot of gamer's want the whole package quality graphics and free open world movement, but with out a reason for running round like headless chicken there's not much point to the game/program and its gets real boring really quickly. With loads to do, ammo to find, puzzles to solve, items to investigate and Aliens and Solider's to kill. This game still has it for me. If you don't mind classic Wolfenstein type graphics I know your love playing this. Have to say although the graphics aren't great, since the release and a few updates its not that bad, the game is very playable. Have fun guys life's to short not to enjoy every second.
I didn't th–æught that in 2021 i will enjoy the game of 1998, but it is.

This is one of the best Multiplayer Games I've ever played. The reason the multiplayer is so fun is because the big selection of guns ranging from the Glock to the Rail-Gun. Un clasicazo, muy bien hecho a pesar de la √©poca.

Played for the first time after 23 years, has it aged well?
Like the greatest scotch i've ever tasted! Amazing level design, unique (groundbreaking at the time) storytelling that doesn't take the controls away from you and that gives you some unprecedented level of immersion that i haven't seen in a while, every plot hint, every foreshadowing you find is up to you to find and that compliments the level design perfectly, some good puzzle solving and a final boss that was a blast to play!
A literal time capsule from the 90's, a must-play if you like classic gems.
But i should warn you, even this version is littered with bugs, not as many as the source version but there's some annoyances here too like randomly being stuck to the ground and some story events stopping all of the sudden, nothing that a quick-reload wouldn't fix.

8.5/10 can't wait to play its expansions!
The game is amazing even regardless of the fact that it was made in 1998.
This game was a masterpiece and still holds up today. I can safely recommend this fantastic title to anyone. but be prepared for a small amount of BS
